resources.string: You haven\'t set up your profile yet, click the button below to start
Profile information is dislayed here. You can set a picture, a name, your age, etc. People who view your profile will see this information. You can turn this feature off at any time in the settings.
You haven\'t added any skills yet, click the button below to start.
Here you can list any of your professional skills and experience; Any information that you would like potential employers to view
